articles.title: Proxima D world is found orbiting the closest star to our solar system - Daily Mail
articles.description: At just a quarter of Earth's mass, Proxima D is the third planet to be detected in the Proxima Centauri system. It was discovered by the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope in Chile.
